entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then periods of snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
